title: Best Selling Books on Amazon KDP : The Truth About Amazon Best Sellers Rank - BSR & Earnings
description:
Best Selling Books on Amazon KDP — What’s the typical pattern for popular YouTube videos about #amazonkdp  ? It’s pretty predictable. They start off claiming they’ve just discovered a brand new, super-secret low-content book niche where one book is supposedly making $10,000 a month or more. Then, to sell you on the dream, they quickly flash the book’s BSR, pull up an Amazon #kdp Sales Calculator, and show you some eye-popping sales and royalty estimates—all to convince you that you can do it too. Sound familiar? Of course, it does—there are thousands of these videos all over YouTube.
Today, we’re cutting through the nonsense. I’ll walk you through the official information straight from Amazon’s Help Center and KDP Help Center. Stay with me as I explain what Amazon BSR really is, how it’s calculated, and uncover the real cost of earning $10,000 a month—or more—on Amazon with a detailed example about The Real Cost of Earning $10,000 with #amazonads  at the end of this video. It’s somethi
tags: how to make low content books for amazon
